Articles.Content:
Welcome Ladies an Gents:

To the First Weekly Expose for KIA - Krazy Industries Aerospace.

Logo Goes Here...

Company Information:

KIA Founder: Seanoog O\'Krazy.

KIA Company Special Thanks: Harvester + C7 Studios

KIA Founded: 25th December 2011.

KIA Company HQ: Ireland. 250~ Meters from Guinness Factory.

KIA Company Moto: What The Mind Can Concieve, Kerbal\'s Can Achieve.

KIA is a NEW Company specialising in Design an Distribution of Orbital an Sub-Orbital vehicals for Scientific Exploration an Defense Contracts.

Both Rockets + Planes will be made available:

Reason for Business Conception:

On Christmas Mourning, after company Head Quaters where invaded by Intoxicated Jolly Red Guy.

Company / Civil / Military Defence an Space Exploration is of paramount concern an interest to Krazy Industries Aerospace.

Company Resources:

All Air-Planes or Rockets are Designed with the up most concern for Kerbal Pilots Safety.

All Vehicles are subject to the strictist an best product testing available to Kerbals.

All Vehicles are made from the finest paper mache, or scrap metal found on the side of the road, Certified 100% Safe.

Vehicles are all PASS (Paper Airplane Simulation Software) Certified (KSP 13.0 is Required).

Company Founder is Certified Aerospace Engineer & Rocket Scientist.

(Printed with Recycled Brown Bio-Mass, an made from 100% Recycled Toilet Paper)

Company Advisements:

KSP 13.2 an C7 Flight Pack 2.16 Are required to play

Fly with a Joystick! (WASD) control is Not Recommended.

Sick Bags are Always Optional Extras!

Have Fun...

Company Products:

VANILLA Rockets:

NOVA-01 (Small Orbital Rocket)

NOVA-01 Orbital Rocket.

Is the First of Many Rockets designs for Civilian Use.

Constitution-01 (

C7 Planes:

K-16 Fighting Folcon.

K-16 Fighting Folcon.

With 10 Minutes of Research an Development.

The most Basic ship ever constructed.

Out Standing Performance:

PASS (Paper Aircraft Simulation Software) Certified.

220M/s at 300Meters.

Single Engine AirCraft.

Sub-Orbital & Orbital Flight Possible.

Upto 8 Minutes Flying Time at 100% Throttle.

Impossible to blow up engine at 100% Throttle.

Can Glide at 80M/s Secound

Extremely Light, an SUPER Agile.

Best Portable Fair Ride in existance, upto 10G\'s easy.

Krazy Industies Advisements:

K-16 Does Not Support ASAS System.

Sustained Flight at 100%, Might result in: No Fuel Situation.

Landing or Ejecting are Strongly advised against Impossible.

SR-71 WhiteBird

With Special Thanks to Golakka, an his original KS-71 WhiteBird Design.

With 10 Years Minutes or Less of Research an Development + Company espionage.

Out Standing Performance:

PASS (Paper Aircraft Simulation Software) Certified.

155M/s at 300Meters.

Twin Engine AirCraft.

Upto 30+ Minutes Flying Time at 100% Throttle.

Impossible to blow up engines at 100% Throttle.

Can Glide below 50M/s Secound

Extremely Agile Flight Characteristics.

Capable of Sub-Orbital, an Orbital Flight.

Krazy Industies Advisements:

C7 Flight Parts Required for operation.

SR-71 is equiped with ASAS System. (Suffers from slight oscillation effect) - Sick bags are optional extras.

Landing or Ejecting are Strongly advised against.

Sustained Flight at 100%, Might result in: No Fuel Situation.

SR-71 WhiteBird + D21 Drone.

With Special Thanks to Golakka, an his original KS-71 WhiteBird Design.

With 30 Minutes of Extra Research an Development + More Company espionage.

Out Standing Performance:

PASS (Paper Aircraft Simulation Software) Certified.

170M/s at 300Meters.

Twin Engine AirCraft + Single Engine D-21 Drone.

Upto 30+ Minutes Flying Time at 100% Throttle.

Impossible to blow up engines at 100% Throttle.

Can Glide below 50M/s Secound

Extremely Agile Flight Characteristics.

Capable of Sub-Orbital, an Orbital Flight.

Extra D-21 Drone, to provide more lift an power for better low level flight performance + Extra fuel.

Decouplable D1 Drone, for safety an weight saving reasons.

Decouplable Landing Wheels, for extra safety an re-usability of craft.

Krazy Industies Advisements:

C7 Flight Parts Required for operation.

SR-71 is equiped with ASAS System. (Suffers from slight oscillation effect) - Sick bags are optional extras.

Ejecting is Strongly advised against.

Taking Off Immediatly - IS Strongly advised.

Decoupling D-21 Drone, an Sharply Pitching UP - IS Strongly advised against.

Sustained Flight at 100%, Might result in: No Fuel Situation.

SR-71 Aggressor.

Work In Progress.

More Information Available Soon.

SX-71 WhiteBird.

In Development.

Proliminary Testing has proven difficult - an unpredictable.

More Unformation Available Soon.

Future Projects:

F-3 Lighting

F-2000 Mirage

Euro Fighter Typhoon

F-14 TomCat

A-10 Warthog

Voyager Rocket - Long Range Exploratory Ship.

Defiant Rocket - Orbital Defense Platform.

TOO MANY KIA\'S!

Killed in action

Kerbal Intelligence Agency

(Something) International Aerospace

And more...
